data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Gaga‘emauga, Samoa. Please, stir the 1,318 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gaga‘emauga, Samoa

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Gaga'emauga against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Gaga'emauga prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Over 3.84 percent of the people of Gaga'emauga are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Patamea
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Patamea, Gaga‘emauga, Samoa.
Spirit, help the 1,318 believers find a person of peace today among the 5,781 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Gaga‘emauga, Samoa.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,318 believers in Gaga‘emauga, Samoa a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
